channel.title: Rs acc please?
channel.description:
hey,
Please someone got a RS acc for me, doesnt mater what combat im to lazy to make myself 1. please dont flame, i know you guys gonna flame :P. but please someone got a rs acc for me i really appreciate it.
Greetings.

item.title: Rs acc please?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:9, topic:399771”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=496890.msg3633220#msg3633220 date=1308409221]

Rsbot is generally better, but costs money, Rsbuddy is cheaper, but less reliable and some people have been “hacked” because of it. Probably just there stupidity though.

I have never heard of a single person being hacked by Rsbuddy’s team, now the scripts that members release for the applet have stolen passwords in the past but that was not Rsbuddy’s fault what so ever, they can’t check every single script. Now on the other hand Rsbot (powerbot) has had staff with direct access (they have been kicked off the team) that have stolen and sold accounts and gold. Do your research before making accusations.

Thats a horrible excuse, the company is big enough to get a team to check them.
[/quote]
What are you expecting from them? There a free company, there not charging a monthly cost and over 80% of their bots are free. That’s like getting mad at google cause they had a scam link on it.[/quote]
They DO have a team to check them, if someone got scammed using Rsbuddy (I mean a script from them), then thats on them, not the person who added it to their deposit.

Read full topic

item.title: Rs acc please?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

I wasn’t being rude to her, I was simply stating facts, we both like arguing and she wasn’t mad lol. Someone loves Carly… lol
[/quote]
Bitch everyone loves me.[/quote]
XD
